website_summaries.verdict: A unique neodymium magnetic shaped in a cube to maximize the magnetic surface area.
pros: 1" cube works just like flat neodymium magnets with extra surface area
Can be chained together with other magnets for longer projects or unique uses
These magnets have holding power of 119 lbs
cons: Magnets can remain stuck together if you place 2 cubes next to each other

customer_reviews.title: Powerful magnet!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no joke, you don't want it next to any piece of metal you don't want it attached to!! Watch your fingers!! It comes in a metal can and it's suspended in the center with a plastic casing. It will attract the lid of the can through your palm.
customer_reviews.author: Art G

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool but Only Buy One At A Time!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are amazingly strong, the strongest magnets I’ve ever encountered. My advice is to not buy two, like I did. You’ll be tempted to put them near each other and you will soon realize that it’s not a good idea. In fact, it’s dangerous. The magnets will violently come together and possibly pinch your skin (I ended up with four blood blisters on my fingers). And good luck getting them apart if this happens. Super powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Renaud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect magnet for demonstrations
customer_reviews.text: Perfect magnet for demonstrations, when teaching how strong magnets can really be this makes a really clear point! I also have a couple of these around the house for when I need to keep something metal in place (currently holding my small pieces of steel stock in the workshop). I would give these 5 stars if they had a permanent marking for the poles, the red line was great for about 5 minutes but wiped off too easily. These are not a toy. These will explode if you let 2 of them slam together - they shatter and can send off shrapnel. These are powerful magnets and when used safely and carefully are great for many purposes.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Caution, Extremely Strong.
customer_reviews.text: Do not expect these magnets to behave like, or assume for one second, they are ordinary magnets. These are monsters. They must be used with extreme caution. They are powerful. But that seems to be what intrigues us most about magnets. Be aware that they will break or shatter if they inadvertently crash with another powerful magnet, and good luck with trying to separate the two. And always watch out for your fingers or skin.
customer_reviews.author: The Continental

customer_reviews.title: Crazy powerful!
customer_reviews.text: The mind gets overwhelmed with all the possibilities. And then it just sits there in its box doing nothing but being powerful and dreaming of a day when it can prove itself and show the 🌎 what it’s made of and maybe even have stories told about the powerful magnet that changed everything. But not today. Today it just sits in its dark box and dreams.
customer_reviews.author: Stianazon

customer_reviews.title: This magnet compliments my nerdy collection nicely and I can do shenanigans with it
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly strong magnet. DO NOT underestimate it. This magnet compliments my nerdy collection nicely and I can do shenanigans with it. Although I only ordered one for now, if anyone reading this intends to order two or more, try to have them separately shipped. There's no telling what could happen during FBA and shipping with strong magnets like these in the same package. Try not to rate it poorly because of your own mishaps with it. It is dangerous how strongly it will stick to ferromagnetic surfaces and similarly strong magnets. Rate products for what they truly are, not because you broke it or can't peel it off the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cccccccccccccccc

customer_reviews.title: No chips very clean packaging
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, chips or sign of time. I bought two so I could see holding strength. Between my hand they hurt. Anything slimmer and you’d have a problem. Very nice. The sharpie mark could be straighter on on of them but both are clearly marked with pole position. UPDATE it’s been 6hrs and I’ve managed to get them together S#i&!!!!!! What now?!?!?!? Luckily I knew to use the instructions provided. These things are fracken awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: There is no purpose for it other than being awesome and educating kids by blowing their minds with it’s powerful magnetism. I’m able to hold it in my hand underneath a 2” thick butcher block table to control a smaller 1cm^3 magnet or several 3/8” steel bearings which leaves them all amazed. Then I can locate wall studs where I attach cms channel magnets to hold stuff, like more magnets or hidden firearms and such. Possibilities are endless and CMS never disappoints in quality and strength of their rare earth magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous, Pointless, Undeniably Cool
customer_reviews.text: There's something intensely satisfying about holding this cube. You know it could seriously hurt you if you come between it and a ferrous material. And it's super dense and heavy for its size. And honestly, I have absolutely no use for it. I've only dared to take it out of the box a few times. But damn. It's cool. It's so strong that even in its ~3x3x3 metal box, it will stick to anything and grab a lot of things. Magnetic range is a function of mass, so a (relatively) large and strong magnet like this has a shocking range! And for the price, I've rarely bought anything near as neat.
customer_reviews.author: Welah

customer_reviews.title: STRONG -- Be Very Careful
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. If you are new to big / strong magnets like this they are a whole different level of magnet and you can quite easily be hurt buy them. Do not let children play with these things.
customer_reviews.author: Shark Likes

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but not THAT powerful
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is a cool magnet. It's really powerful for the price, and looks great. It can hold up my 15lb sledgehammer without too much trouble. However it is far from the 75lb in the description. Now, I won't pretend to know how they measure that. I do know that if I use it to stick my hand to something iron, it doesn't hurt and I can move my hand with only a mild amount of effort. I would personally guess it could hold 25lbs. Which is enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Klint Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is a very powerful magnet, be careful in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful magnet, be careful in handling it. Did not ship in container shown but was bubble wrapped. I accidentally let two of these get too close to each other. I now have one larger magnet <chuckle> They give you a sheet on how to handle safely, follow instructions and figure out how you are going to get it off of what ever you attach it to!
customer_reviews.author: William c l

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously strong!
customer_reviews.text: Great magnet! Dropped it one star on presentation become the tin box came crushed. As far as easy to remove not sure I understood this question but NO not easy to remove!!! Its a ridiculously strong magnet!!!! So technically should be 0 stars for that. I am thinking of wrapping some twine around it to help make it easier to remove from metal objects and to prevent injury when it attracts an object and makes it come towards your hand at warp speed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fun, but be extra careful if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: Crazy strong. My kids love playing with this thing, but I usually have to manage as it can be very dangerous. Pinches fingers, can smash together and break into shards. Just use common sense with powerful magnets. The latest is my kids made magnetic slime and will have it attach to the magnet. Ferrofluid is next, although I'm not too excited about the mess. Science is great! I really appreciate the thinking that went into the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size and strength for you
customer_reviews.text: If you need to remove ink-filled security tags from clothing? This is the perfect size and strength for you. Just rub this on the bottom of the tag (opposite the side with the tiny metal dot) until it releases. My coworker had purchased a sweater for her daughter and the clerk had failed to remove the security ink tag. My coworker also lost the receipt. She did not want to return to the store with a tagged sweater and no receipt, as she thought that they would assume that she had stolen it. This magnet worked perfectly. I would not recommend this magnet for shoplifting, it takes about 5 minutes to find the correct magnet position that releases the tag.
customer_reviews.author: St. John's Hand

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Stunning when you first really start to comprehend the strength. It has a great presentation with quality component parts for the relative affordability of it all. I really enjoyed it. Do not have your phone by it, computer, old tv etc. If you wear nice mechanical watches and even think they have resistant balance springs I wouldn't risk it as these are very magnetic. So if giving as a gift make sure you tell them! They are fun and amusing
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Very nice magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Came in a crushed box. Since this is a Christmas gift, it wasn't acceptable. Called Amazon and they refunded my money. I immediately ordered a replacement. Tried the magnet and it does not disappoint, stuck it to a pair of plyers and almost couldn't get it off. People who say it doesn't have enough strength are not trying it out on a thick piece of metal. Believe me it is very strong.
customer_reviews.author: wildtrky

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: This is not a magnet you want your kids playing with. It is super strong. I ordered two, accidentally put them together...can’t pull them apart. I’m a 6ft 250lbs guy. It’s no joke. This is a very useful magnet. I put it in a sock and swing it over the ground to pick up nails and metal shavings. Don’t put it in your pocket because you’ll forget and it’ll smack and dent your car or refrigerator or dishwasher (I know from experience). The picture is of the two stuck together.
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana Boy

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet!
customer_reviews.text: This magnet is strong! At first I was a bit disappointed as I tried it out on some objects but once I got it near a door hinge I quickly changed my mind. This magnet could probably break a finger if you aren't careful. I'm a bit disappointed though because it is pretty fragile. I accidentally dropped it onto a tile floor and a bit of it chipped off. I wish it was made better.
customer_reviews.author: Romelpis1212

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as expected -- MAYBE
customer_reviews.text: When stuck to a steel plate it was easier to remove than I expected. Compared to a 3x12mm N52 magnet it wasn't much more if any difficult to remove. Geometry may be a factor since it much easier to grasp a 1-inch high magnet than is to grasp a 3mm high magnet. The extra leverage on a large magnet may make the difference.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Strong but brittle
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet. Very brittle if come in contact with another magnet of it's caliper, however that is normal for neodymium magnets. If you keep the magnets apart, shouldn't be an issue. I've ordered two and shattered both due to my fault for not heading the warning as others have said.
customer_reviews.author: Admstr

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a replacement neodymium magnet after my old one went missing. I use a magnet to find screws or nails in drywall and identify the location of studs. Nice packaging - my old one had no packaging and when I put it in my pants pocket and walked too close to a steel appliance (e.g. washer, dryer, fridge) it would slam the pocket against it. Annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Roedel

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful magnet! Love it -- but use with care!
customer_reviews.text: This magnet FAR exceeded our expectations in a very positive way. It is so powerful that it flew from my hand when I was near a metal balcony railing, and despite leaving one still wrapped in cardboard, it tore THROUGH my son's pocket to connect with its match. My teenage son LOVES these magnets, but their power MUST be respected to avoid personal injury!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super powerful
customer_reviews.text: These things are insane. I bought 2 and put one into a plastic pill bottle and put the other one near it and the plastic shattered instantly. They were a real bitch to get apart. I used a vice and pliers to pull them apart, which was tricky itself as they want to stick to anything. Definitely don't want to get your hand pinched in between these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super strong!
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the force with an inch of separation. Like, when it is in its case. I could put the magnet on the back of my hand and hold up a piece of iron under my hand. This thing is super strong! I was afraid, however, to hand this to my son. Magnets of this type are very brittle. I could just envision him allowing it to slam into something and shatter. I'm not dinging the product. Just, be responsible with this cool and powerful toy.
customer_reviews.author: Anomal

customer_reviews.title: fun to have, could be dangerous if you're not careful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what compelled me to buy a super-strong magnet, its fun to have and is useful sometimes (if you drop a bunch of tiny pins while sewing or something), but one time I held it in my hands too close to my metal frame bed and pinched my hands giving me a blood blister. As long as you actually think about where you're using it its an interesting thing to have >:)
customer_reviews.author: Haru Park

customer_reviews.title: Crazy strong!
customer_reviews.text: Came as advertised and appears to be decent quality. According to the Internet experts, this is about as large as you should go before needing to take precautions (Watch YouTube). And yes, it will pinch the snot out of you if you are not careful! Great for party tricks as it will easily drag dinner ware around the table.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer

customer_reviews.title: This magnet is no joke
customer_reviews.text: I got this to repair a flipped gas gauge in a Buick Park Avenue and it did the job in seconds. You can use it for anything it will find metal you didn't even know was lost. Have to be careful though as it will get damaged quickly if you let it get pulled to a big metal object too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: elowef150

customer_reviews.title: Super strong!
customer_reviews.text: From the wife: This magnet is super strong, almost dangerous to play with if you don't pay attention to the items around you, lol. I bought it for magnetic putty but I am already finding other entertaining uses for it. I feel that the price was a great deal considering the quality of this magnet, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark kiessling

customer_reviews.title: Strong and very cool but received with many defects. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I got this awesome magnet in the mail today only to find two dents/chips that had been coated over and several pin holes, and also defects in the coating. Luckly Amazon has refunded me and I'm currently having a second one shipped, hopefully this next one is in better quality. All the other reviews have been good and no reported defects so hopefully it was just a one time thing. When I receive the new magnet and it has no defects I will make a new review giving five stars. But as is currently I am not satisfied with purchase. Other than that it is a very strong awesome magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gissler

customer_reviews.title: Great starter magnets
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly strong magnets. Great starter magnets. Be careful if u have 2 of these though I’ve seen in videos if u pinch ur skin with them they will draw blood. Packaging and shipping was great. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jyoung

customer_reviews.title: This is so much fun
customer_reviews.text: I don't think that I ever got this with a specific purpose in mind, but dear lord it is fun. This thing sticks so hard to literally everything it touches. For a while we were seeing how many bottle caps would stick to it. We got over 100!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Its fun. Be carefull
customer_reviews.text: I mean.. gotta be carefull. These arent toys and are a blast to play with. I highly reccomend these for some one thats semi experianced with magnets and their powers. Just be carefull. For cheaper fun harbor freight has tiny packs of 10 magnets in a bottle to practice with
customer_reviews.author: 🖕🏽

customer_reviews.title: Powerful magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Scary powerful magnet power! NOT for young children... I got two of these for my 7 year old Son, but found that they are too dangerous for him to play with unattended. Still very interesting and educational, and they will hopefully still be here as my Son grows up :)
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln A. Kroll

customer_reviews.title: This is super strong. It fell and chipped a little so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is super strong. It fell and chipped a little so a tip I recommend (there are better options) is wrapping it in duct tape. That works like a charm. I use this for many things. Sometimes I use it to toss my keys on when I get home other times I'm using it to hold up something to shade my car. My car is old so right now the magnet is holding up the fabric that's falling off the ceiling in the car. Also this is so much fun to play with. For ten dollars, a useful toy like this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Hakim

customer_reviews.title: 🕶👍🏼 I think this magnet is gonna "stick" around!
customer_reviews.text: 🕶👍🏼 man this thing is better than a stud finder. It stuck to the head of a nail right through the wall. Be careful, as advertised it is very strong! Especially for how small this thing is.
customer_reviews.author: Cholo Joe

customer_reviews.title: super powerful and definitely requires adult supervision
customer_reviews.text: super powerful, but easy to pinch hands. It says to wear gloves....be careful as you can damage the magnet (can shatter or coating flake off) or the thing the magnet is attracted to. If you're attaching to stainless steel, the force of initial attraction is not unlike a hammer coming down. If you get your finger or skin in the way it will hurt and may result in injury. I want 2 of these to see what I can smash but afraid that would end badly for the above reasons.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: CMS 1" Neodymium
customer_reviews.text: These are SO COOL! However, NEVER let any part of yourself get between the magnet and a magnetic surface. This item is completely unforgiving in this regard. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: Container came damaged!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened it up and the box was already damaged in multiple spots! :( There is a red line on mine I’m guessing maybe that’s the north end? It’s a very strong little magnet though. I’m still waiting on the rest of my order to play with it I’ll update if I have any other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: A good one
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this magnet for experiments. It is a sturdy magnet of this kind. It has hit steel pipes several times and still hasn't broken yet. BTW, I've broken two other magnets of the same material but different shape.
customer_reviews.author: Tianyi

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets. The real deal.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these magnets on numerous occasions and these are the best I’ve found on amazon. Not only because of the strength and quality of the magnet, but also the way they package them (each come in their own box) is much easier and safer to handle out of the box. I use these mainly in the construction field and I’ve found that if you fully and tightly wrap the magnet with electrical tape it keeps it from shattering if you accidentally drop it. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Manny M.

customer_reviews.title: Really cool novelty/toy
customer_reviews.text: Great little tin box package. Cool novelty. Beware of pinched fingers as this is a strong magnet. Watch out around credit cards and electronic devices as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Big strong cube magnet
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need this, not sure why I bought it, it's fun though. Don't get it stuck on metal you can't slide off or your fingers stuck under it
customer_reviews.author: clay hunter

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Super strong! It almost pulled my filling out of my teeth when I took it out of its box. Works great for locating metal studs thru drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: I put easy to remove down because the magnet is tough for a kid to remove from something magnetic. Used this with the magnetic putty and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Strong & powerful
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a couple of these very strong magnets. Some as gifts for my crew. Strong & powerful. One of the best tools for locating metal studs in walls with multiple layers of drywall.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G. So. Cal

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Don't get it stuck to a solid iron machine because it's pretty hard to straight pull off. Nice and compact for general use and a great source of fun
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous kinda

customer_reviews.title: Paid full price & Sent used magnet
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who loves magnets. Disappointed that we were sent a used magnet. It came with chips on the corners and a red line down the middle made with permanent marker.
customer_reviews.author: C&A

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a monster. Keep it away from other magnets because you will never get them apart (or they might disintegrate depending on the type).
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well had two go flying towards each other, with my thumb in between, it was like hitting my thumb with a hammer. They are quite powerful. BTW the trick to separating two that are stuck together is to put them on the edge of a counter, with one on the counter and one hanging off. Then push down on both pieces. You still needs a lot of force, but at least you are trying to slide them apart instead of pulling them apart.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Meisel

customer_reviews.title: Careful these are powerful, and fun!
customer_reviews.text: They come in their own little steel box with a plastic spacer to keep them away from the sides. Bought as gifts these are powerful magnets. If allowed to approach a heavy steel surface they can get away from you and hit hard enough to crack the magnet. Can raise blood blisters if you get between them and that steel plate.
customer_reviews.author: Yellowjacket

customer_reviews.title: Real strong
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why the hell I bought this. I just like magnets I guess, but I have no use for it. If one does have a use for it they can rest knowing this magnet is strong. You look at its size, then get surprised by its strength. Even if you don't need it, it's still pretty darn cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Fun
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION: If you buy two of these magnets, DO NOT put them together! It is rather difficult to pull two of these magnets apart. After smashing together by the force of the magnets, one of mine chipped and while pulling them apart I cut my hand open. There isn't much of a practical use ive found, besides holding papers up on my whiteboard. These are really great for showing off the fun of magnetic fields to other people, just keep them away from your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended but not for kids
customer_reviews.text: I used it with my elementary school class. Be careful, it can cut you. Extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: Elroy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet. Bought 2. Now they’re stuck together and impossible to separate! Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great magnet
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet, be careful. I use it as a stud finder or finding anything metal like hidden nails in reclaim wood prior to milling. The case is perfect for transporting or just storing the magnet.
customer_reviews.author: jRunner

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: High quality and strength. The tin box is also rugged enough for magnet storage. I used it to repair a gas gauge in my Buick, repaired in 10 seconds. Next may be for the children's science projects
customer_reviews.author: Rick G

customer_reviews.title: It's a magnet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to remove gets 5 stars even though it's not really that easy, it's as designed lol. It's a strong 1" cube magnet. Meets all expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL as can be, watch your fingers.
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a quick way to test Silver, it’s quality. Very strong. Pacemakers?? Just stay away just in case. Electronics? Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: CMS Magnetics Super Strong 1” Neodymium Cube Magnet
customer_reviews.text: CMS Magnetics Super Strong 1” Neodymium Cube Magnet You get what you pay for. CMS is a quality magnet that performs as suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Elthadiya

customer_reviews.title: This magnet is formidably strong. So far I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This magnet is formidably strong. So far I have kept it stored in its protective plastic barrier box--and it still picks up stuff while within that container. My house is built from steel framing and so I can hang stuff from the walls with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Avi du Jour

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly strong
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I bought this but I couldnt believe you could get such a strong magnet for 10 bucks. Sure enough it is very strong. It is fun to play with but you have to be careful, I’ve pinched myself a few times with it. And whatever you do, do NOT bring this near any other magnets.
customer_reviews.author: T4keTheShot

customer_reviews.title: Great value, shipping and delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for experiments. Good value, shipping and fast delivery. I recommend checking this sellers items. I will use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like pictures with box
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to make something to put on my desk with the magnetic sand. This thing is strong. I Cant imagine what I would do if I accidentally got two of them stuck to each other. Looks exactly like pictures with box
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: It’s the strongest I’ve seen
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I only bought these out of curiosity. It’s comical how incredibly strong this magnet it. It’s current sitting in a cabinet about a foot away from my compass which is not pointing north right now.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaUAV

customer_reviews.title: Not kidding, this is strong
customer_reviews.text: So super strong. I bought this one over others because of the packaging that it comes in, and I am glad I did. It is hard to keep off of anything that is remotely magnetic, set the box insert that separates it from the walls is really helpful!
customer_reviews.author: LoHa

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my magnet this afternoon, and I'm pleased to say "I love it!" Naturally I walked around the house testing the magnets strength on various things, it wasn't until I stuck it to the side of a steel firepit when things got interesring. It stuck pretty damn good! It was in no way easy to slide to the edge and eventually pull off of the thick steel. I love it! Now I'm waiting for my ferrofluid to arrive, that should be fun to use with this strong magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, very dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Wear gloves and don't let them come together, unless you have some special rig set up you won't get them apart again(unless you heat them up, but this will ruin them permanently)
customer_reviews.author: silver king

customer_reviews.title: Powerful magnet. I am a little of a nut ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerful magnet. I am a little of a nut when it comes to magnets. This one is strong enough to place it under a wooden table and make silverware mystically move. My invisible friend loves to play tricks ;o)
customer_reviews.author: Sabine P

customer_reviews.title: Strong Magnet, excellent for science demonstrations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use with some science experiment demonstrations for our VBS camp. I did pinch my finger a couple of times accidently getting too close to metal objects (it is easier than you think!). It attached to a piece of metal and I nearly couldn't get it off. I had to work it to the edge of the metal to slide it off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boggess

customer_reviews.title: Super strong!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a magnet that will hold my heavy calendar on my fridge! Also, the shape makes it easy to grab if you want to remove it—not flat like other magnets. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: I love my widgets

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Received with damaged box and damaged magnet cube inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A SERIOUS MAGNET!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great magnet, but use extreme caution. This thing can send you to the emergency room if mishandled. Keep it in a pill bottle for general use, and never handle naked without gloves and adult supervision. Easily the strongest magnet I have ever owned, a high-quality product for sure. Be sure to master the handling of this magnet before you even think of ordering anything larger. THIS IS A SERIOUS MAGNET!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kap'n Klystron

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great magnet, exactly as advertised. My only complaint is the manufacturer's packaging (not shipment packaging, that was well done). The magnet comes with plastic brackets/spacers inside a ferrous box! Not a major issue if handled carefully, but it seems an odd choice considering the magnet's strength.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tool for finding studs through drywall
customer_reviews.text: Best tool for finding studs through drywall. I am an electrician, if you need to find framing through drywall buy this
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: I just am so amazed at these and how strong they are
customer_reviews.text: I just am so amazed at these and how strong they are, You must be very careful with them for they are not toys and definitely are not for children to play with but for responsible young adults it would be cool. They are extremely strong and even being weight trainer they were very tough for me to separate when i attached both together. I had bought some disk ones and some slammed together and shattered. I practiced caution with these because i seen how britly they can be. Would definitely get more if the need or want comes up.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Serna

customer_reviews.title: Not letting other people handle these magnets without fair warning of their power.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these wonderfully strong and dangerous magnets. Showing them off in our community center one on top of the table and one below. No one could pick them straight up. Then one guy slid it off to the side and picked it up. He set it down about 8 to 10 inches away. Realizing what he had just done I tried to pull the magnet away from underneath the table but it was too late the acceleration and velocity of the magnet shot it across the table and onto the floor. Thank goodness no one was in his line of fire. It landed on the carpet and roll 10 ft away.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Wowza.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is comically strong. I walked too close to a garbage truck with this thing in my pocket and long story short I ended up getting a paycheck for a full days work when I arrived at the dump bonded to the truck by the hip.
customer_reviews.author: Binaryfuneral

customer_reviews.title: They aren't kidding
customer_reviews.text: Most powerful magnets i have ever seen. Two got stuck together, and I needed a vice and a pair of pliers to get apart.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet!
customer_reviews.text: It a pretty strong magnet!! I use it at work a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepysnails

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: My 6 y.o. grandson , was flabbergasted by this tiny marvel . Comes in a nice tin can with a 2 pice plastic cage . Love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Biggins

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love this little cube. I bought it to experiment how magnets would affect my electro magnetic field. This thing immediately relieved me of a toothache that had been debilitating for days.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Thomas Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly strong! I swore I would be careful with this thing, but the first thing that happened was I banged up the corner of it trying to put it up on the fridge. Fun, but be careful!
customer_reviews.author: P. Allan Farrow

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim because I've never owned a really powerful magnet. It arrived quickly and was packaged very well. I have no complaints for the price I paid, but I don't know what to do with it yet. It's too powerful to leave lying around and you can easily damage yourself or the magnet if you're not careful. Just a friendly warning to know what you're getting into. If you just want a magnet to play with, you may want to think again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Turner

customer_reviews.title: Holy heck!
customer_reviews.text: Neodymium Iron Boron magnets are very strong. I had two of these, and you need a vice and pliers to pull them apart. they grab things about a foot+ away and with amazing force. I actually lost one this way, as I set it down and it grabbed it's counterpart and it shattered the other magnet and sent sparks in all directions from the force! wear gloves and be extra careful with this sucker. and definitely wrap it in padding to protect it. Rare earth magnets of this size and bigger can give nasty pinches, and even crush bones in hands, fingers, etc. not a play thing!
customer_reviews.author: M. Coisman

customer_reviews.title: Fun but can be dangerois
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnet but very brittle. Creates Razor Sharp shards that spark when they come together.
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: Great for projects
customer_reviews.text: These are some strong fridge magnets! More of a talking piece than anything. Don't drink too much and use it
customer_reviews.author: Bogart

customer_reviews.title: Very strong!
customer_reviews.text: These magnets really are very strong. We bought for my father to use as a small but useful " metal stud finder" and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Great but overrated.
customer_reviews.text: Super magnet and an immesenly great deal! Does not seem as strong as rated as I have a lesser rated magnet with more pull.
customer_reviews.author: Coal Monger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnet and a must have for magnetic slime.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with magnetic slime. What a fun magnet. It is very strong but I don’t find it dangerously so and it was a gift for my 9 year old son. It made his week! (He has moved on to other projects now....lol)
customer_reviews.author: Dawn W.

customer_reviews.title: Small but strong
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the size of this magnet fool you. I bought this along with another 1" cube N52 Neodymium magnet. I once had two magnets, now I have one. I literally cannot get them apart. This, however, is a good result and I'm quite happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Lansing

customer_reviews.title: I'm ordering a second one soon :)
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things. Perfect box & holder, the magnet itself is a perfect size, weight, and smooth as a baby's butt.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Magnets
customer_reviews.text: Nice packaging and easy to remove. Big label on box with a magnet warning!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super strong! and funny in my story
customer_reviews.text: they are so strong! i bought two and there was a piece of MDF in between, and i tried to pull them apart and the snapped together, the coating cracked and i have a blood blister an inch long in my pointer finger. even funnier, when i first unboxed them, i didnt know how strong they were and i waved them in front of my belt clasp area! boy was my face red!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: So strong it's scary
customer_reviews.text: Respect this magnet or it will hurt you. This is not a toy intended for small children. If you get this stuck on a thick piece of steel, you will have a hard time getting it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Useful and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Works better than a stud finder.hust be careful with any metal around it
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nuts. I keep it in my tool belt at work to hold all of my drive bits. Works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: strong but keep in mind they're fragual
customer_reviews.text: Be careful to play with it. It's not just strong it can break and harm you with sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Great for Magnetic Classroom Fun! Under Supervision
customer_reviews.text: I Originally bought this for some magnetic fun, and got exactly what I was expecting but this is very very very dangerous especially around other Neodymium magnets. Great for certain experiments but not recommended for anyone inexperienced with magnets. Gloves Recommended when using around metal or magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S.

customer_reviews.title: It is quite strong at 120lb of magnetism and is quite fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have a fascination with magnets. It is quite strong at 120lb of magnetism and is quite fun to play with. WORD OF CAUTION!! don't get it too close to pacemakers!! It makes mine hum if I get it too close to my chest.
customer_reviews.author: reddragon696

product_meta.title: CMS Magnetics Super Strong 1" Cube Neodymium Magnets in a Tin Box for Added Safety | Rare Earth Magnets as Stud Finder and Science Project Magnets
product_meta.description:
CMS Magnetics rare earth magnets have a high saturation magnetization which ensures top physical pulling force & maximum energy product. 

CMS Magnetics 1 inch neodymium magnet cube is made of sintered NdFeB rare earth magnetic material and packed in a shielding tin box with framed plastics. This magnet has many applications, like stud finder, tool hanger, science projects, decorations, towel hanger, knife holders, refrigerator Magnets etc. 

General Description: 
The neodymium cube magnet is made for various magnetic applications and projects. It can be used at home, school offices and industry. Since it is made of strong neodymium magnetic material, each of this cube magnets provides 124 pounds of holding power for a direct pull. it is not the same magnet you played with as a child! It is 15-20 Times the force of those old time magnets. Never experienced this powerful neodymium cube magnet before? Now it is the time! 

Applications:
1. Science project and education: Together with iron fillings, this neodymium cube magnet is a good teaching tool for science education. It also works well with magnetic slime and iron oxide for the same purpose. It is also a good magnet for science fair projects. 
2. Industrial and Manufacturing: for material handing tool or equipment. 
3. Magicians, inventors, Hobbyists, Handymen: Garage tool hanger and organizer, kitchen knife holders, magnetic fishing, home or garden decorations
4, Magnetic therapy 
5. Crafting

>> Ridiculous Strong and Very Useful: Each Piece of These Magnets Provides 124 LB Holding Power as a Direct Touch and Direct Pull with just 1” Size. They are Great as Stud Finders, Fishing Magnets, Holding Magnets, Gifts and Industrial Applications like Separation
>> Many Uses: A Great Stud Finder, Home Improvement, General Magnetic Holding, Retrieving and Industrial Applications, DIY Projects, Kids Science Projects and Science Education etc.
